isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE AND FENDERS - IC BUS - REMOVE AND INSTALL - HOOD SEALS

svcsubproc.title: Hood Seals - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 14for Items in parentheses.

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. 3/16 INCH RIVET AND NUMBER 10 FLAT WASHER. UPPER HOOD SUPPORT
4. 3/16 INCH BLIND RIVET AND NUMBER 10 FLAT WASHER

step1.para: Release the hood latches on each side of the hood and raise the hood to the full open position.

Drill out blind rivets and flat washers (Item 1) using a 9/64 inch (3.56 mm) drill bit and remove hood support (Item 2) from cowl flange (Item 3), passenger side shown. Save upper hood support for installation, if not damaged.

Drill out blind rivets and flat washers (Item 4) using a 9/64 inch (3.56 mm) drill bit and remove side hood support (Item 5) from cowl flange (Item 3), passenger side shown. Save side hood support for installation, if not damaged.
Repeat procedure to remove driver side upper and side hood supports.
Remove hood seal (Item 6) from cowl flange (Item 3) by pulling it from the cowl flange lip. Save hood seal for installation, if not damaged.

svcsubproc.title: Hood Seals - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 14for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Check the upper side hood supports and hood seal (Items 2, 5 and 6) for cracks, tears or breaks; if damaged replace them.
Position the hood seal (Item 6) at the cowl flange (Item 3) and push it into place on the cowl flange lip.
Position upper hood support (Item 5) on top of the cowl flange (Item 3) and secure with 3/16 inch blind rivets with No. 10 flat washers (Item 1) passenger side shown.
Position side hood support (Item 5) on the side of the cowl flange (Item 3) and secure with 3/16 inch blind rivets and No. 10 flat washers (Item 4), passenger side shown.
Repeat procedure to install driver side upper and side hood supports.
Close the hood and fasten the hood latches.
